comments:
3.1

In the CVS repo view, select a project (mine was under a parent module, but that
should not matter).
Choose Check Out as Project.
In the project name field, type: foo/bar/baz

The log gets:

Recommend validating the name using IWorkspace.validateName before attempting to
access the project, and indicating the problem in the UI.
